October 15th 3
Capt: The: J Thomasson
Comd 1st Battery Ky Artillery
Sir

Yours of the 3d instant in relation to filling up your Battery with twelve months men is received. For your information I send the following order from the War Department, in which the privilege is granted you.
You may fill up the 1st & 2d Batteries with twelve months men as requested in your telegram of yesterday (Signed) Edwin M Stanton Secty of War

Respectfully yours
John Boyle
Adjt Genl Ky
